features.name: Big Knife
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 slashing damage.

features.name: Hit Me
features.description: When you hit a target with an attack, you mark it until the start of your next turn. A marked creature has disadvantage on any attack roll that doesn't include you. You can maintain one active mark and marks don't stack.

features.name: Shield Smash
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Shifty
features.description: When one of your allies that you can see is reduced to 0 hp. You may move up to half your speed without provoking an opportunity attack.
